item.description:
NEW STUFF:
Well, since Salt is now pushed to the 1:30/10:00 slot, I figured we'd change movies. The Other Guys (Will Ferrell, Mark Wahlberg) is supposed to be pretty funny, and it's in keeping with the actiony movie theme of the night.

Summary:
Detective Allen Gamble is a forensic accountant who's more interested in paperwork than hitting the streets. Detective Terry Hoitz is a tough guy who has been stuck with Allen as his partner ever since an unfortunate run-in with Derek Jeter. Allen and Terry idolize the city's top cops, Danson and Highsmith, but when an opportunity arises for the Other Guys to step up, things don't quite go as planned.

The movie starts at 7:35, so let's meet inside the lobby at 7:00. Then I'll buy us all tickets, we can grab snacks and settle in.

Hope to see you on Thursday!

--Dana
508/308-4897

----------------------------------------

OLD STUFF:
Salt promises to be a tightly packed action movie with Angelina Jolie. Trivia: They first had a male lead in mind, then figured a woman would be more engaging.


SUMMARY:
Before becoming a CIA officer, Evelyn Salt swore an oath to duty, honor, and country. She will prove loyal to these when a defector accuses her of being a Russian sleeper spy. Salt goes on the run, using all her skills and years of experience as a covert operative to elude capture, protect her husband, and stay one step ahead of her colleagues at the CIA.

THE USUAL STUFF:
We'll meet right inside the theater ticket lobby doors and then I can buy us all discounted tickets ($8.00 each for FMM members and their guests). I also have $3 vouchers each for small sodas and small popcorns (can be used towards a larger size). Exact change makes me like you more.

As always, guests are welcome, just be sure to include them in the RSVP so that I know who/how many to expect.

Please keep your RSVP as up-to-date as possible. And please call me if you're going to be late or need to change your RSVP after I close RSVPs on the site (2 hours before we meet). My cell is: 508/308-4897. I'm also good for directions if you get lost.

After the movie, we'll head to Unos to chat about the movie (and just chat).

I'll update the time a few days before the meetup, so keep an eye on your email!

Hope to see you for Salt!

--Dana
508/308-4897
item.name: The Other Guys, was Salt
